message: Let's be fair, 60-40 is a good deal!
I'm feeling generous, but let's be realistic. This is a good deal while it lasts!
Come on, meet me in the middle, 58-42 is the best I can do!
Time is running out!  I'm making a fair offer. Let's close this deal.
I'm willing to compromise, but I still think I deserve the bigger share.
Let's stop wasting time. A 50/50 split is the fairest and most logical solution. Take it before inflation eats away at the value!
